thread.title: Zuckerberg faces the House in second-day testimony

title: Zuckerberg faces the House in second-day testimony
text:
Zuckerberg pushes back against more data controls 10:57am EDT - 01:23 
Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg was back on Capitol Hill Wednesday, this time to testify before the House Energy and Commerce committee, which proved to be a tougher crowd than the day before. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg was back on Capitol Hill Wednesday, this time to testify before the House Energy and Commerce committee. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2JCsjQZ
